English: Selling coins doesn't do anything. But, if coins are in a stack#with other cards, you cannot sell the stack. Enabling this mod makes#selling stacks with coins in them possible.#Very useful after a Forest raid.
Selling Coins/Shells Converts Them to Local Currency

Normally, you cannot turn shells into coins on the mainland or turn coins into#shells on the island. Enabling this setting permits the conversion. You cannot#convert coins to shells on the mainland or shells to coins on the island.
